title: 联机
txt_content: 我是个新手，谁能和我联机呢？

replies.author: ATTEL
replies.txt_content: 你找HIM联机吧，他很热心肠的。{:10_500:}

replies.author: Timyang
replies.txt_content: 与新手联机蛋疼，我还是去跟老手们联机吧。话说我有兴趣去教教新手，不过，还是不要了………………

replies.author: huangwenhui020
replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
